schema.description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Openx adapter

customFloor.description: The minimum CPM price in USD.

delDomain.description: The delivery domain for the customer.

schema.title: Openx Adapter Params

tests.description: llama-70b generated negative; focus on pattern keyword
tests.python_error:
'123abc' does not match '^[0-9]+$'

Failed validating 'pattern' in schema['properties']['unit']:
    {'description': 'The ad unit id.',
     'pattern': '^[0-9]+$',
     'type': 'string'}

On instance['unit']:
    '123abc'
